alert.note: Alert for Lassen (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 08 at 4:00PM PDT until June 08 at 5:30PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northeast California, including the following counties, Lassen and Plumas. * WHEN...Until 600 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 359 PM PDT, Emergency management reported heavy rain in the advisory area due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is already occurring along US-395 south of Susanville. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Central Lassen and Plumas Counties - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
